item.title: Dumped furniture in communal space, 26th September
item.description:
LFF Rob Green of LFB visited today and discovered fly tipped house hold items including pictured furniture and other items found on the communal space on the top floor.

item.title: Smart Drive business causing noise disturbance, 26th September
item.description:
Smart Drive, a car and van rental company based on Grosvenor Way, use two of the car parking spots on the east side of the road, overlooking De Havilland Studios. They're causing noise disturbance through the day with electric tools
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling rubbish discarded with food waste left at bottom of stair on the ground floor of Herrick House, 26th September
item.description:
It’s now 15:15hrs on the 26/10/25 & the rubbish in the photo has been dumped at the bottom of the stairs. It includes a mixture of food waste and recycling. Unhygienic, anti-social and will attract vermin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmington Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree replacement outside Nos 38 and 40 Torbay Road, 26th September
item.description:
Could I request a replacement for the much valued tree outside Nos 38 and 40 Torbay Road which was felled at the insistence of insurers after subsidence problems? The site has this week been paved over. I had imagined Brent's policy was replacement in such circumstances and should be very disappointed to learn this is not the case. Would it be possible for us to have a new tree?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Torbay Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged railings from commercial way Turning on to Peckham mark way, 26th September
item.description:
Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to inform you of an incident involving one of our vehicles that caused damage to the roadside railings at the crossroads of Commercial Way and Peckham Park Road. As our driver was turning right from Commercial Way onto Peckham Park Road, the impact bar of the vehicle became wedged in the roadside railings, resulting in damage. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience or hazard this may have caused. Please find my contact details below should you require any further information or wish to discuss the matter: Lloyd Keeling Maintenance Manager Precon Products Telephone: 01359 256247 Email: lloyd.keeling@preconproducts.co.uk Thank you for your understanding, and we look forward to your guidance on how to proceed. Kind regards, Lloyd Keeling

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham Rye, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Zippos circus poster has been put up on the fencing at the front of hall place car park on the exit side which is obstructing the view of oncoming cars when exiting the car park, 26th September
